description: When you travel far and pack light, the Sojourn 45 is the bag for the job. Rolling luggage is great—but sometimes you need a comfortable backpack-style carry. Oversized 90 mm wheels and a lightweight HighRoad chassis keep you rolling in comfort, and the stowaway AirScape™ backpanel and harness expand your horizons. StraightJacket compression straps cinch down packed items for added storage capacity. Built to fit international carry-on size requirements, your trip can begin the moment you walk off the tarmac.
name: Sojourn 22" / 45L

specs.value: bluesign® approved, 100% recycled 460D high-tenacity nylon w
bluesign® approved, 100% recycled 500D high-tenacity nylon, DWR treatment made without PFAS
Alloy peripheral frame and center handle stays
AirScape™ ridged foam backpanel Adjustable torso length
Ventilated mesh-covered die-cut foam harness, Comfortable ventilated airmesh-covered contact surfaces, Adjustable sternum strap with whistle
Padded airmesh-covered hipbelt Single 25 mm webbing ErgoPull closure
